intro: You're stopped by a rich looking boy.
speaker: Rich Boy
intro_dialogue:
Good day to you.$I can't help but notice that your
{{strongestPokemon}} looks positively divine!$I've always wanted to have a Pokémon like that!$I'd pay you handsomely,
and also give you this old bauble!
title: An Offer You Can't Refuse
description:
You're being offered a @[TOOLTIP_TITLE]{Shiny Charm} and {{price, money}} for your {{strongestPokemon}}!

It's an extremely good deal, but can you really bear to part with such a strong team member?

1.label: Accept the Deal
1.selected: Wonderful!@d{32} Come along, {{strongestPokemon}}!$It's time to show you off to everyone at the yacht club!$They'll be so jealous!

2.label: Extort the Kid
2.tooltip_disabled: Your Pokémon need to have certain moves or abilities to choose this
2.selected: My word, we're being robbed, {{liepardName}}!$You'll be hearing from my lawyers for this!

3.label: Leave
3.selected: What a rotten day...$Ah, well. Let's return to the yacht club then, {{liepardName}}.
